00019 #include <string.h>
00020 #include "agg_basics.h"
00021 #include "agg_scanline.h"
00022 
00023 
00024 
00025 namespace agg
00026 {
00027 
00028     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00029     scanline::~scanline()
00030     {
00031         delete [] m_counts;
00032         delete [] m_start_ptrs;
00033         delete [] m_covers;
00034     }
00035 
00036 
00037     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00038     scanline::scanline()
00039         : m_min_x(0),
00040           m_max_len(0),
00041           m_last_x(0x7FFFFFFF),
00042           m_last_y(0x7FFFFFFF),
00043           m_covers(0),
00044           m_start_ptrs(0),
00045           m_counts(0),
00046           m_num_spans(0),
00047           m_cur_covers(0),
00048           m_cur_start_ptr(0),
00049           m_cur_count(0)
00050     {
00051     }
00052 
00053 
00054     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00055     void scanline::reset(int min_x, int max_x)
00056     {
00057         unsigned max_len = max_x - min_x + 2;
00058         if(max_len > m_max_len)
00059         {
00060             delete [] m_counts;
00061             delete [] m_start_ptrs;
00062             delete [] m_covers;
00063             m_covers     = new unsigned char  [max_len];
00064             m_start_ptrs = new unsigned char* [max_len];
00065             m_counts     = new int16u[max_len];
00066             m_max_len    = max_len;
00067         }
00068         m_last_x        = 0x7FFFFFFF;
00069         m_last_y        = 0x7FFFFFFF;
00070         m_min_x         = min_x;
00071         m_cur_count     = m_counts;
00072         m_cur_start_ptr = m_start_ptrs;
00073     }
00074 
00075 
00076     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00077     void scanline::add_span(int x, int y, unsigned num, unsigned cover)
00078     {
00079         x -= m_min_x;
00080         memset(m_covers + x, cover, num);
00081         if(x == m_last_x+1)
00082         {
00083             (*m_cur_count) += (int16u)num;
00084         }
00085         else
00086         {
00087             *++m_cur_count = (int16u)num;
00088             *++m_cur_start_ptr = m_covers + x;
00089             m_num_spans++;
00090         }
00091         m_last_x = x + num - 1;
00092         m_last_y = y;
00093     }
00094 
00095 
00096 
00097 }
